data.name: Hadaka Shitsuji - Naked Butlers
data.detailed_description:
Description & Features

A butler-bullying Visual Novel for people who love butlers by people who love butlers!


- Traditional Visual Novel with multiple endings
- Over 500 beautifully drawn CGs to unlock
- 30+ hours of average reading time
- Story & Art developed by Mito Togo

Story

One day, our protagonist suddenly loses his job. Driven to his wit’s end, he happens upon a mysterious flyer:


“Daily wages: 30,000 yen. An easy job anyone can do! You can even sit around all day if you want. Interested applicants may apply at the following address.”

Feeling dubious, but lacking in any other options, our hero makes his way to the location listed in the flyer... where he finds a palatial estate with chalk-white walls and dazzling butlers.

According to the butlers, the owner of the estate is out of town, and as the butlers must continue to perform their duties even in his absence, they are searching for a “substitute master”. Our protagonist’s sadistic side begins to awaken as he continues to give them increasingly-preposterous orders...

data.short_description: A butler-bullying Visual Novel for people who love butlers by people who love butlers!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Pentium 4+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 64MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1650 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10+ Compatible
  • Processor: 1 Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 64MB
  • Storage: 1650 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu or equivalent
  • Processor: 1 Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 64MB
  • Storage: 1650 MB available space

data.legal_notice: Copyright (c) Mada Koubou All rights reserved

content_descriptors.notes: This title is not suitable for players under the age of 18 or those who may be sensitive to fictional depictions of the following: workplace sexual harassment, stalking, physical and mental abuse, accidental death, murder, cannibalism, consumption of bodily fluids, and graphic sexual scenes of both a consensual and non-consensual nature between one or more adults featuring unprotected sex, group sex, food, violence, bodily fluids, bondage, domination, erotic asphyxiation, drowning, pet play, beastiality, foreign object insertion, double penetration, fictional drugs, exhibitionism, and crossdressing.
